text: Many thanks for this refesher course, it's been excellent.
author: EMDR Refresher - Phases 5-8 attendee

text: Best training course I have been on. Very informative, felt comfortable throughout. I feel ready to give EMDR a go.
author: EMDR Basic Training part 1 attendee

text: The best trainers, with a wealth of knowledge! Will look forward to Part 3
author: EMDR Basic Training part 2 attendee

text: Naomi and David make a perfect team with their knowledge and skills. Keep it up!!! Love the teaching style & structure of the course
author: EMDR Basic Training part 2 attendee

text: This was such a brilliant day for me. I feel like the morning section especially helped develop my understanding of what EMDR is aiming to achieve and how this maps on to the assessment phase
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: Level for refresher was perfect. We all had different levels of knowledge and experience in EMDR so can’t have been easy to target that.
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: I particularly enjoyed the interactive nature of the training – the mix was a good balance to keep me engaged and focused
author: EMDR Basic Training attendee

text: it has helped me to feel confident to start using skills again
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: I really enjoyed today and feel inspired and motivated that I can use these skills clinically.
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: Found videos and lots of case examples given interesting and engaging.
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: It covered all the essential elements necessary to carry out standard EMDR treatment while bearing in mind complex cases.

text: Level for refresher was perfect. We all had different levels of knowledge and experience in EMDR so can’t have been easy to target that.
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: I generally struggle with online training but the video clips were really useful at keeping the training interesting.

text: it was clear, concise and I loved Naomi’s ability to balance the theory with the art of therapy
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: Loved the trainer’s passion and generosity
author: EMDR Basic Training attendee

text: Day was really excellent – exactly what I needed for reassurance and increasing confidence – delivered in a compassionate and knowledgeable style. Great links and pointers to other experts.  Very many thanks.
author: EMDR Refresher Day attendee

text: Very enthusiastic, confident and creative teaching. The energy level of the delivery was enlivening and engaging.
author: EMDR Basic Training attendee

text: The trainer knows the subject extremely well and could answer all queries and explorations.
author: EMDR Basic Training attendee

text: I loved seeing the therapist at work and how EMDR looks rather than how it is in theory. Very helpful!

text: Thank you it was an excellent day and I feel confident and well equipped to support my clients with EMDR.

text: I really appreciate the slides and scripts in particular as templates for my work.
